website_summaries.verdict: Consists of plant enzymes that reduce the level of plaque-causing bacteria for the dog.
pros: Consists of ingredients that fight plaque but that also provide essential vitamins
Made in America, so you can trust the quality of the ingredients
Uses kelp and other natural materials to fight buildup of plaque
Works on trapped food particles in the dog's mouth
cons: Not proven safe to be used with animals intended for breeding

customer_reviews.title: The best tarter control product for pets
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. My border collie is 15 she has never been to the vet for a teeth cleaning only because she lets me scrape and clean her teeth as part of her spa package. I’ve tried many products over the years but this one seems to help the best with her stinky breath which she’s had since a pup. It makes the tarter very soft and easy to brush off with her weekly brushing.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Great product. My holistic vet says it shifts the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My holistic vet says it shifts the ph to help prevent plaque and tartar from building up on my dog's teeth. I've seen a difference. After using it for nearly a year after a cleaning, teeth still looked pretty good. When I ran out of it for a few weeks, I noticed a build up of more staining and plaque. Dog doesn't seem to notice any change in taste of food. For a 16 pound dog, this small bottle lasts almost a year, so it's a great value too!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive stomachs beware
customer_reviews.text: I got this product because I stopped giving my very senior dog rawhide bones and wanted to keep her teeth super clean and healthy. Unfortunately, even though I started out with 1/2 the recommended dose it still gave her diarrhea. I stopped, got her healthy and tried again with the same result. I'm not suggesting that this would happen with your dog or that it isn't a good product, I'm just saying that it didn't work out for us. Her health is more important than using this for clean teeth and fresh breath. I'll just try brushing.
customer_reviews.author: lovetolearn

customer_reviews.title: Smile Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended an algae-based tooth powder. Over time and with consistent use this really helps reduce tartar and improve dental health without the hassle of trying to brush your dog's teeth or the expense of professional cleaning. It has even improved the cleanliness and gum health of my senior rescue who had severe tooth wear and damage. A quick scoop into their food once a day is all it takes. The scoops are small so it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with ease of application and results
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with ease of application and results. Now on my 2nd bottle and can see the difference in my 16.5 year all Spitz. Her teeth had been dark yellow/brown and are now noticeably lighter. My chow hound did not hesitate to gobble her food with the powder applied. Have recommended to other doggy friends.
customer_reviews.author: K. T.

customer_reviews.title: Dog eats with steak bites & vegetables
customer_reviews.text: Have not had very long but already our little rescue dog has better smelling breath- hope to see some improvement in gums- not a candidate for dental surgery- she is a VERY FUSSY EATER-does not like any treats we have tried so far.Amazing that she eats this supplement with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: CHLOE RUSSELL

customer_reviews.title: Helps with dog’s bad breath.
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the expensive products I have purchased for my little dog’s bad breath, this is the only product that actually helps. It does not completely address the problem but it does help. I wish vets would add this option to their recommendations because anything they recommended did not help at all. One water additive my dog didn’t even like so would not drink the water. She likes the taste of this product so all our doggies get a little bit added to their food.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: This product was recommended by our new puppy's breeder
customer_reviews.text: I got a new puppy to join my elderly dog. This product was recommended by our new puppy's breeder. Prior, I was brushing my elder dogs teeth with doggy tooth paste every day. He still needed a cleaning by the vet. Within two weeks of using Seadent, I saw a difference in His teeth. So, with our new puppy I started using it. His teeth are still beautiful and I've been using this product for over a year, now. I'll try anything to avoid having my dog go to the vet for teeth cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Who knew?
customer_reviews.text: I started using sea sent on my 6 year old greyhound because since she was a racer, she never got proper dental care. Her breath is much fresher and her teeth are not as funky as they once were. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Frieda10

customer_reviews.title: Just a dash will save you some cash!
customer_reviews.text: Best smile and breathe of the pack! So simple and affordable to promote long lasting hygiene for you best friend. Just a dash will save you some cash at the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product after one bottle doggies teeth were white again.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Footlik

customer_reviews.title: my dog didnt seem to notice I was sprinkling on ...
customer_reviews.text: my dog didnt seem to notice I was sprinkling on her food. I didn't really see a difference in her teeth but her breath did improve.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes away bad breath, not sure if teeth are cleaner, definitely nutritional
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it had any dental effects but his breath definitely stinks less. Either way, kelp is super nutritional for the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Viva Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, inexpensive product. I use it for my 15 year old pit bull who had horrible breath (she does not have bad teeth). It's amazing how well it works. A tiny bit (the serving size) once a day makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: annrki

customer_reviews.title: It’s a keeper.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using SeaDent for a week and I have seen a difference already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So I bought this product as an alternative for dental ...
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this product as an alternative for dental chews and brushing. But my dog has runs from it. Please try in a smaller size or a sample if possible. Now I am stuck with a can I cannot use. And my friends refuse to try since their dogs might have runs as a result as well. Not for dogs with sensitive stomach
customer_reviews.author: Alla Kireeva

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions and used this product for several months on my dogs. I bought the powder hoping it would work on their teeth and help their horrible breath. It did absolutely NOTHING. On to research another product...
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for show dogs - keeping their nose black!
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs, I have had this for a while... use it in the morning. Not only does Kelp help keep your dogs nose black but, it helps with their breath and health! If you prefer a plasticky smell over the smell of your dogs breath. This is the best and it doesn't inhabit them to not eat their food!
customer_reviews.author: Shayla McGhee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This really works! Use it in my 2 dog's food every day. My 4 yr old labs teeth look like I brush them every day!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill R.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Works incredibly well! Plan on giving it a month to 6 weeks to begin to see the difference, but once it begins....wow! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jjjjordan

customer_reviews.title: At least my dogs like to eat it.....
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know if it worked, but will keep ordering as it says it takes a whike
customer_reviews.author: Louisa’s New Leash On Life

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked amazing for my shih tzu teeth and bad breath! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: kimmy

customer_reviews.title: High hopes
customer_reviews.text: I've got high hopes for this product but I do not know how much to give. There was no scoop in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog refuses to drink the water if SeaDent is in it
customer_reviews.text: it may work but my dog would rather be dehydrated than drink this
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Volftsun

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff and ive tried many things
customer_reviews.text: Love this works great for my Chihuahua who has horrible breath!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: product info correct and happy to add to doggie food
customer_reviews.author: PERSIA MATINE

customer_reviews.title: ive been giving this to my pug for a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: ive been giving this to my pug for a couple weeks now. its kind of helping her itching but the problem is she doesn't eat one bowl a day so its hard to know how much to give her
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing with consistency
customer_reviews.text: Both dogs loved it and after just one bottle I saw an improvement on my older dogs dental hygiene.
customer_reviews.author: TDodge

customer_reviews.title: Good product we can recommend to other pet owners
customer_reviews.text: We have been using for our dog for years. Good product we can recommend to other pet owners.
customer_reviews.author: PV

customer_reviews.title: but the dogs didn't like the taste and stopped eating the food
customer_reviews.text: Convenient, but the dogs didn't like the taste and stopped eating the food.
customer_reviews.author: SfiFan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like that this keeps my dogs teeth free from plague!
customer_reviews.author: Teri M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works wonderfully to keep tarter off my dogs teeth, every dog owner should use it!
customer_reviews.author: tracy mistler

customer_reviews.title: however the dog does not like the
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to be working, however the dog does not like the taste
customer_reviews.author: carole harwood

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old dog's teeth look like a 6 month old's - clean and tartar free.
customer_reviews.author: AnnIch

customer_reviews.title: For good teeth
customer_reviews.text: Our vet recommended it for our 15 year old dog. Sprinkle a little on the food each day. I don't know how it works, but it is working. We have a fragile old lady for a dog who has great teeth!
customer_reviews.author: R. Day

customer_reviews.title: Warning on label should have been in online description! Wasted my money!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the warning on the label I will not use this so I wasted my money. The warning cautions about use in animals with Thyroid disease. Thyroid disease is very common in older dogs and since my three are advancing in age, I feel I can't risk using this product. The warning should have been in the online description.
customer_reviews.author: Japanese Chin rescuer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I'm doing a 1-2 punch w/seadent and zymox water additive. Teeth are looking AWESOME after one month. Slight yellowing is all that is going on now. Nasty brown plaque...GONE!
customer_reviews.author: Constant Reader (lawgan@rmci.net)

customer_reviews.title: Their teeth weren't bad, but I don't see much of a difference ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs use this daily as an additive for their food. Their teeth weren't bad, but I don't see much of a difference since using the product either.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

product_meta.title: Animal Essentials SeaDent for Dogs - 70g
product_meta.description: Seadent for dogs combines the popular, plaque-fighting power of kelp with five well researched plant enzymes that have been proven to fight plaque and bacteria in the mouth.
feature_bullets: Seadent for dogs attacks plaque-forming bacteria in multiple ways: by the systemic activities of the kelp
Antibacterial enzymes that begin working against plaque immediately upon entering the mouth
Enzymes serve to break down various food particles that are trapped between the teeth and under the Gum lines
